data.message: yeah he should really have a helmet on if this is an ad.

replies.message: No he shouldnt. Skaters dont wear helmets unless they're on vert/mega ramps.

yeah because your head is well designed to take impact against concrete what a stupid thing to say. the only reason people dont wear them "it doesnt look cool" i used to not wear helmets then i had a close call with the concrete and that was on a street park. but after you smash your head you sure wish youd had one on. also the point was in adverts that kids are going to watch they should be teach good habbits. see a 11 year old on a skateboard getting smashed into by a 25 year old on a bmx is a mess. saftey first any idiot can end up paralized or whatever.
At that is a risk every skateboarder is aware of.
except kids who dont know better. its why skateparks make you wear a helmet till your 18. i still wear one its not worth the risk to me.
